text: niccayamaka hpir'avn ippumiyil perumaiyatittuk kontu, anta pumiyilullavarkalaip (pala) pirivinarkalakki, avarkaliliruntu oru kuttattarai palahinappatuttinan; avarkalutaiya an kulantaikalai arut(tuk kolai cey)tu pen kulantaikalai uyirutan vittum vaittan; niccayamaka avan kulappam ceyvoril oruvanaka iruntan
